Text.Page:
You've got to stop the mekonari arcanathieves and their urisk minions.

Those feathery wretches are killing our people without pause. You've got to do the same here.

Hunt them down and send them back to the Dream.

You got these from the mekonaris? Well done.

Whatever they are up to, I hope we're in time to stop them.
The mekonaris and their minions must be dealt with. Don't come back until you've completed your mission.
